body_html:
@petewarden,
I am implementing few of the ops mentioned above.
started with mean, stop gradient and then
conv2dbackpropinput.

For op_mean, collecting information from graph transferrer as below(4 inputs) (1 output):

  const struct tensor *input = self->input[0];
  const struct tensor *axes = self->input[1];
  const struct tensor *dims = self->input[2];
  const struct tensor *reduction = self->input[3];
  struct tensor *output = self->outputs[0];
  //do mean operation based on axes, dims

I am not sure what does reduction_indices does. -> I assume it is reducing the order of matrix from 3 to (3-2)->1

number of inputs vary after graph transformation.
so is there a guide to know number of inputs as well outputs for operations like -> Mean, Stop gradient, etc.

Thanks,
